macro.name: PORT1
macro.description: Serial COM port to connect to

macro.name: CLOCAL1
macro.description: N for output flow control using DSR

macro.name: CRTSCTS1
macro.description: Y for RTS/CTS hardware flow control

macro.name: IXON1
macro.description: Y for output software flow control

macro.name: IXOFF1
macro.description: Y for input software flow control
